page.title: 19RELIGION IN GLENURQUHART
page.content: In{Drumnadrochit}there are 2 Churches of Scotland and 1 Free Church of Scotland.7 miles up the glen there is an Episcopalian Church and nearby in{Cannich}is a Roman Catholic Church. To examine the state of religion in this area we conducted a{survey} amongst 88 pupils at the local school. The survey showed that the area is {multi_denominational.}With 46% belonging to Church of Scotland,23% to the Roman Catholic Church, 15% to the Free Church, 2% to the Episcopalian Church. The rest did not know which religion they belonged to! We then asked them how often they went to {church}:40% went occasionally,33% went often but 27% never went.We then asked if they went to Sunday School:28% did go but 72% did not.Finally we asked them"Do you believe in God?":55% said yes,22% said no,24% said don't know.
